value:
A castle needs knights, and a
knight needs romance. So, if
A equals B equals C...$k$pThat means a castle needs
romance! Wait. That math
didn't add up.

Hey, friend, you keep up the
good watch. For what? For the
only thing worth watching for!$k$pLadies for Luke! Any kind—long as
they're easy on the eyes.

I'm an Altean knight in training, but
that pretty much means that I'm
a legend in the making!

My pal Roderick and I go way back.
Worries too much, but other than
that, he's a fine guy!

We should get out of here and
find ourselves an adventure!
Or maybe some hearts to woo!

Hello there! You've now become a
part of the Legend of Luke! You can
thank $Nf.

The Legend of Luke keeps
getting better and better!

Pretty good, but a legend like
me can do better!
That's all? Can't be. Not for me.

Thank you for doing your part in
the Legend of Luke!

Call for your bards! They will want
to write songs about me, Luke,
the finest knight of Altea!

How do you like how the Legend of
Luke has turned out—just as great
as you thought, right?$k$pThere's no stronger, more virtuous
knight than I am. It almost scares me.
But you can't keep a legend down!$k$pHa! I'm just joking. I'm really just
an idiot that you believed in,
despite all my big talk.$k$pI couldn't stay focused for a minute
without you guiding me. So, you know,
I really think YOU'RE the big deal.$k$pWhat? Don't look so surprised! I'm a
humble guy under it all. Just please
don't let anyone else know, OK?
はぁっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Ouch!
Gotta love the Luke!
Go easy on you? Ha!
Legend in the making!
Luke is larger than life!
I lost...?
Haha
Need the Luke, huh? Here to help!
Hey, now! You'll mess up the Luke's hair.
Who's larger than life? Me, Luke!
Want a nickname? I'll give you one that will really stick!
Any pretty healers around? Cuz I need some healing!
People like big deals, right? Not average deals?
Who wants to be a leader? Not me. All work, no glory!
On it!
All mine!
Onward!
